title: Property Transfer Tax (Exemption) Order, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 109
Gazette dated Friday, 12th June, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 30 OF 2015
The Property Transfer Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap. 340)
The Property Transfer Tax (Exemption)
Order, 2015
IN EXERCISE of the powers contaiend in section six of the Property
Transfer Tax Act, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Property Transfer Tax Title
(Exemption) Order, 2015.
2. The transfer of property by Millennium Challange Account exemption
Zambia and any person or individual eligible for property transfer from tax
tax exemption as provided for in the Millennium Challange Compact
Act No. 6 of
Act, 2013 shall be exempt from property transfer tax. 2013
A. B. CHIKWANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
8th June, 2015
[MFB.101/11/3]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K2.00 each
110 Statutory Instruments 12th June, 2015
